page.title: 03Transport-bus,car,bicycle.
page.content: The majority of people in this block possess a{motor vechicle (car,van or Land Rover).In our class of 26 children 3 had no car and 1 parent had a motor bike . For those wishing to use{Public {Services}there are{Trains}(page 2) and{Buses.}A local company runs a bus service to neighbouring villages.The bus runs 3 times a day (except sunday) to Llandeilo where connections can be caught to further destinations. There is a bus on a Friday to Cynghordy and Rhandirmwyn. Some people also use the{School Bus service}to get to and from town.In our class we discovered that 8 children had never travelled on a service bus and one never on a train. Each child has his own{bicycle}and 4 have{motorbikes}to ride in the fields.
